gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.INumericItem

Packages that use INumericItem
Package
Description
gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function
Support for rendering paths to bound object nodes and Metaschema definitions resulting from evaluating a Metapath.
gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library
Built-in Metapath functions based on the XPath 3.1 specification.
gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic
Provides implementations of Metapath atomic data type items.
